# Low-Light Vision (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a carrot)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:**Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Magic of Arcanis (Paradigm Concepts), pg. 184

You gain [[S3.1G-M - Universal Monster Rules G-M (Bestiary 6 Apx)|low-light vision]] for the duration of the spell. You can see twice as far as a normal human in starlight, moonlight, torchlight, and similar conditions of poor illumination. You retain the ability to distinguish color and detail under these conditions.

*Low-light vision* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell; the minimum caster level is 9th, and the XP cost is 500 XP.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* This version replaces the one found in *Spell Compendium*, page 134.
